description: Infinium Momentum is a supple, comfortable cross country glove for high-intensity training and competition. It is lined with GORE-TEX Infinium™, which is fully windproof while allowing maximum moisture to escape. The glove has a weather-resistant Lycra backhand. The palm is in durable stretch polyester, and piqué seams ensure good comfort and grip, while also minimising the risk of chafing. The short, supple Lycra cuff allows for easy access to your sports watch. A training partner with a great fit, enabling you to perform at your very best on the ski trails.
name: Infinium Momentum Gloves

specs.value: Backhand made of Windproof, Waterproof and Breathable Hestra 3-layer Interlock fabric- 100% polyester
Made of Durable Stretch Polyester - 70% polyester, 30% PU
Gore-Tex Infinium™ Windstopper® Lining, Micro Check on Backhand and Dry Touch in Palm
